request.description:
Route to logout a user.  
During logout, the cookies are deleted

header.value: accessToken=logout; Path=/; Expires=Tue, 27 Jun 2023 08:24:54 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None
refreshToken=logout; Path=/; Expires=Tue, 27 Jun 2023 08:24:54 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description: Route to verify a user's email
Route to reset a user password

Route to initialize a reset password.  
A verification email is sent to verify the user

item.description: This folder contains user authentication routes

item.name: User

request.description:
Route to get all users registered on the platform  
Only accessible to an admin

request.description:
Get a particuller user details  
Only accessible to the user and an admin

Shows if a user is currently logged in or not  
Shows the user that is logged in

Route to update user details  
Can only be accessed by the user  
Not used in this project because only emails are collected

item.name: URL

NB: This route is only accessible to an admin

request.description:
Get a particular user's URL details  
NB: This route can only be accessed by the user and an admin

This route is to redirect a user to the original site.  
It is accessible by anyone with the shortened URL link

Get list of a particular user's shortened URLs  
NB: This route can only be accessed by the user and an admin

Route to shorten your long URLs  
NB: You can also customize your ULR endings by passing a value to the custom field

Route to delete a shortened URL  
Only accessible by the owner of the URL and an admin

item.description: This folder contains the URL routes
